result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

cc: Branch 4.

Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 1:23 pm. 
INCLUDES: 21CF1331, 21CF1478, 21CF1597, 21CM503, 22CF48 & 22CF925.

Deft appears via video, in custody, pro se.

Adj: 1:25 pm.

Review hearing on September 2, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary Hearing on September 7, 2022 at 09:20 am.
Pre-trial conference on September 13, 2022 at 03:20 pm.

Includes cases 21CF1331, 21CF1597, 21CM503, 22CF48, 21CF1478, and 22CF925. No contact with victim(s): M.B., D.J.W., A.L.W., G.T.Z.; Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. No driving without a valid DL. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Heather. 
Case called: 2:12 p.m. 
INCLUDES: 21CF1331, 21CF1478, 21CF1597, 21CM503, 22CF48, 22CF925.
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig.  Defendant appears from MCJ via Zoom, with Atty Paige Metzman, in person.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
Prelim Time Limits Preserved.

COURT QUASHES WARRANT.

COURT ORDERS: $1,000.00 cash bond to cover all files.

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s): M.B., D.J.W., A.L.W. G.T.Z.
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- No driving without valid DL. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.
